about: Sun God is a monumental statue by French-American sculptor Niki de Saint Phalle located on the campus of the University of California San Diego. The figurative sculpture is a 14-foot multicolored bird-like creature, perched atop a 15-foot tall arch-shaped, vine-covered concrete pedestal.
name: Sun God

history.title: An amazing title for this landmark
history.content: Now gather around the fireplace kiddo
